reviewText: this product is exactly as described and the seller gets it in the mail immediately.  I'd buy from this seller again!

C'mon - what's better fun than this? Watch this disc with your squirt or college team before you hit the ice.
Grapes gets the adrenaline going, with plenty of trademark color commentary and greatest hits video from the best in the NHL.

Don Cherry loves to rile up the liberal

morons with there 'political stupidity'

and keep the fights a-comin'! Nobody

knows the roots of Hockey better or

is more of a character now than Cherry

since Eddie Shack! Grapes let's 'The

Good times role' and his schtick is

better than ever. Long live Grapes.

And let the foreigners and french

eat cake!
